title: Digital Interactive Content Design for Elementary Social Studies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Cultivation of simulation/VR-based content design capabilities in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Design digital content for elementary social studies education by applying the four stages of the ADIC model (planning, design, production, evaluation)
Implement interactive learning scenarios using VR/simulation technologies in smartphone-based environments
Improve content usability and educational effectiveness through project-based assessments incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
